externalId.description: If the event originates from a record in a 3rd party system, use this parameter to pass the unique ID of that record. That ID will be communicated in outbound webhook notifications from SIGNL4, which is great for correlation/synchronization of that record with the alert. If you resolve / close an alert you must use the same External ID as in the original alert.
externalId.title: External ID

externalId.description: If the event originates from a record in a 3rd party system, use this parameter to pass the unique ID of that record. That ID will be communicated in outbound webhook notifications from SIGNL4, which is great for correlation/synchronization of that record with the alert. If you resolve / close an alert you must use the same External ID as in the original alert.
externalId.title: External ID

filtering.description: Whether to apply event filtering for this event, or not. If set to true, the event will only trigger a notification to the team, if it contains at least one keyword from one of your services and system categories (i.e. it is whitelisted)
filtering.title: Filtering

locationFieldsUi.description: Transmit location information ('latitude, longitude') with your event and display a map in the mobile app
locationFieldsUi.title: Location

service.description: Assigns the alert to the service/system category with the specified name
service.title: Service

property.description: Name of the binary properties which contain data which should be added as attachment
property.title: Property Name

title.description: The title or subject of this alert
title.title: Title

message.description: A more detailed description for the alert
message.title: Message
